Articles.Content:
My most successful aircraft. The 'Kerbal All-Purpose Fighting Aircraft - 5 Revision 6 Edition 9'. Nicknamed the 'triangle' not just because it is shaped like a triangle, but it has three variants. The original one is stock.

CONS: 

-the MK1 to MK2 fuselage sucks and often disconnects during lots of g\'s. DO NOT TURN QUICKLY IN 2X speed!

PROS:

-Awesome.

-lotsa firepower 

-VERY STABLE

-Good lift/weight ratio.

-Back-up parachutes (if cockpit and MK1 to MK2 fuselage disconnects.

-needs less than 1/2 of the runway to lift up

-maneuverable

-somewhat long range

-fast for it\'s size

TIPS:

-You should pull up manually and activate ASAS when you want to cruise

-Works great at most altitudes

-parachutes do not activate in one stage. smash that spacebar for emergencies 

-When landing, it is advised you nose down to lose some altitude, because this thing can glide

The original (KAPFAC-5R6E9) is a cruise missile all-purpose aircraft that attacks by rammingSTOCK

The B version (bomber) REQUIRES JELLYCUBES MODULAR MISSILE PACK is a conventional bomber with unguided bombs

The MT version (missile truck) REQUIRES JELLYCUBES MODULAR MISSILE PACK is a missile truck (remember missiles are affected by gravity).

Jellycubes weaponry [http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4886.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4886.0)
P.S due to OBVIOUS REASONS I included space for more missiles/bombs ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Any feedback? Or does it suck? :\'(
